About the Company: GTL Infrastructure Ltd is the pioneer in Shared Telecom Infrastructure inIndia.The company offers ready to use passive infrastructure to wireless telecom operators.GTL Infra serves as a single window one-stop-shop provider of infrastructure and services to telecom operators by undertaking the full range of responsibilities in building and maintaining the sites. The company`s expertise lies in providing robust passive infrastructure solutions to telecom service providers thus adding value to their service by optimizing cost structure and enhancing reach.The services offered by the company include Passive Infrastructure Solutions and In-Building Solutions
